verbs.description: [ARG0: The Miami - Dade Police Department] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [V: released] [ARG1: body camera footage of last week 's shooting at Trump National Resort in Doral , showing an intense confrontation between officers and a gunman] .

The Miami - Dade Police Department on Monday released body camera footage of last week 's shooting at Trump National Resort in Doral , [V: showing] [ARG1: an intense confrontation between officers and a gunman] .
